data.name: ColorSetBMPNotSupportedMessage
data.value: ColorSet BMP import is not supported.

data.name: CreateBackupsMessage
data.value:
This will create a backup of all index files.
Do you want to Backup Now?
Warning: In order to create a clean backup, all active modifications will be set to disabled, they will have to be re-enabled manually.

data.value: Would you like to move the existing data to the new location?

data.name: NewBackupLocationTitle
data.value: Select new location of Index_Backups folder

data.name: NewerVersionDetectedBackupMessage
data.value:
A newer version of FFXIV was detected. Would you like to create a new backup of your index files now? (Recommended)
Warning: In order to create a clean backup, all active modifications will be set to disabled, they will have to be re-enabled manually.

data.name: NewInstallDetectedBackupMessage
data.value:
New TexTools Install Detected.
Would you like to create a new backup of your index files now? (Recommended)

data.name: newModpacksLocationTitle
data.value: Select new location of ModPacks folder

data.name: NewSaveLocationTitle
data.value: Select new location for Saved folder

data.name: NoBackupsFoundErrorMessage
data.value:
No backup files found in the following directory: {0}
Index entries will be put back to original offsets instead -----------------------------------------------------

data.name: NoBackupsFoundMessage
data.value:
No Index Backups were found. Would you like to create a new backup of your index files now? (Recommended)
Warning: In order to create a clean backup, all active modifications will be set to disabled, they will have to be re-enabled manually.

data.name: NoModsDetectedErrorMessage
data.value: No mods were detected in the options list.

data.name: OldModListDisableFailedMessage
OldTexToolsFoundMessage
data.value:
Older TexTools ModList Found.
The Older ModList is incompatible with this version.
In order to use this version, all previous mods will be disabled, and the previous ModList erased.
If you would like to retain your mods, it is recommended that you create a backup ModPack in the older TexTools Version, then import it into this one.
Would you like to continue?

data.name: OutdatedBackupsErrorMessage
data.value:
Index Backups are outdated.
Please create a new backup from Help > Backup Index Files
TexTools will attempt to start over without using backups.

data.name: OutOfDateInstallMessage
data.value:
The install location chosen is out of date
Please locate the following directory.
Standalone: .../Program Files/FINAL FANTASY XIV - A Realm Reborn Steam: .../steamapps/common/FINAL FANTASY XIV Online and navigate to .../game/sqpack/ffxiv
Standalone clients may be installed elsewhere and named differently. This is NOT the directory under Documents/My Games.

data.name: SavedLocationChangedMessage
data.value:
Location of Saved folder changed.
New Location: {0}

data.name: StartOverCompleteMessage
data.value: The start over process has been completed.

data.name: StartOverMessage
data.value:
Starting over will:
Restore index files to their original state. Delete all mod dat files from game folder. Delete all mod list file entries.
Do you want to start over?

data.value: {0} mod(s) successfully imported in {2} Seconds. ({1} Error(s))

data.value: This will delete the entire group, and all the options in it.

group already exists, please rename the group.

This process is not reversible, do you want to continue?

data.name: ProblemCheckDatIssueMessage
data.value: There was an issue checking Index Dat Counts

data.name: LanguageError
data.value:
There was an error reading data for the selected language, would you like to revert to English?
Language may be changed again later from the Language menu.

data.name: AddNewTexturePartQuestionMessage
data.value: Whether to add diffuse mapping? Selecting Yes will add a diffuse map, and selecting No will add a default map.

data.name: NotWizardModPack
data.value: This is not a wizard modPack

data.name: AddNewTexturePartErrorMessageWrongCategoryOfItem
data.value: Currently only supports "Gear", "Character", please contact esrin if necessary.

data.value:
A ModPack with this name already exists.

data.name: StartOverErrorMessage
data.value:
There was an error while starting over.
Please check for problems by selecting Help -> Check For Problems.

data.name: InvalidCharacterModpackNameMessage
data.value: Name cannot contain any of the following characters: \ / : * ? " < >|

data.value:
Failed to update the viewport.

Any mod on the 3D model will be disabled.

data.value: An error occurred when trying to modify the material.

data.value:

MissingBones
UpdateBodyTextureError
data.value:

data.name: PatchDetectedMessage
data.value:
An FFXIV Update has been detected on this FFXIV Install.
The Modlist will now be checked for errors and changes. Please ensure FFXIV is closed, and do not close TexTools until this process is complete.

data.name: PostPatchBackupPrompt
data.value: The Modlist has been validated successfully. Would you like like to disable all mods and create updated index backups now?

data.name: PatchDestroyedFiles
PostPatchBackupsComplete
data.value:
Index Backups Created Successfully. The Post-Patch Process is now complete.
You may now enable your mods via Mods => Batch => Enable All Mods If you encounter problems, please use Help => Download Index Backups/Start Over.

data.name: PostPatchComplete
data.value:
The Post-Patch Process is now complete.
If you encounter problems, please use Help => Download Index Backups/Start Over.

data.name: PostPatchError
